Resolution.tooltip: Resolution of the renderers. Doesn't seem to make that much of a difference performance-wise.

Shadows.tooltip: Toggles every light having shadows. Kills performance.

Sample Count.tooltip: Number of raymarching samples. Trades quality for performance

Scattering Coefficient.tooltip: Controls amount of light that is reflected towards camera. Makes the effect stronger.

Extinction Coefficient.tooltip: Controls amount of light absorbed or out-scattered with distance. Makes the effect weaker with increasing distance.

Mie Scattering.tooltip: Controls how light is reflected with respect to light's direction.
